idea: tag8 primarily provides tracking solution. One part of the business engages in creating a comprehensive global lost and found service ecosystem. tag8's objective is to significantly increase the percentage of lost valuables returned to their rightful owner. tag'8 global network enables your lost bag to be located typically within 6-8 hours. tag8's service is for the lifetime, there are no renewal or subscription fees, 24X7 Customer service and global logistics support.The services are embedded in RFID protect passport cases, bag tags, key tags and passive smart tags.These products are sold through a wide offline as well as online channel.The other part of the business is to offer mobility lead smart management of fixed assets and inventories for corporates.  tag8 works across a wide spectrum of technologies, including QR, barcode,NFC,RFID, beacon, GPS. The operating model is primarily on a SAAS basis.In addition, tag8 also provides QR based value added services such customer feedback, attendance, marketing promotions etc
name: 3Y VENTURES LLP

idea: we want to purchase, acquire, take on lease or in exchange or in any other lawful manner any area, land, building, structures and to turn the same into account, develop the same and dispose of or maintain the same and to build townships, markets or other buildings residential and commercial or conveniences thereon and to equip the same or part thereof with all or any amenities or conveniences, drainage facility, electric, telephonic, television installations and to deal with the same in any manner whatsoever  To construct, erect, build, repair, re-model, demolish, develop, improve, grades, curve, pave, macadamize, cement and maintain building, structures, houses, apartments, hospitals, schools, places of worship, highways, roads, paths, streets, sideways, courts, alleys, pavements and to do other similar construction, levelling or paving work, and for these purposes to purchase, take on lease, or otherwise acquire and hold any lands and prepare lay-out thereon or buildings of any tenure description wherever situate, or rights or interests therein or connected therewith and to participate in Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana and provide affordable housing to the middle class or lower class of people.
name: VAIBRENT BUILDERS AND DEVELOPERS PRIVATELIMITED

idea:
Our goal is to produce pleasing, nutritious and noteworthy products. We are deeply zealous about promoting healthiness or fitness through enabling light hearted & limitless nourishment for everyone, every day through our products. Our motto is don’t make or sell anything you won’t give your own kids. That is why we are uncompromising on our quality – your health and safety is our top most priority.

Globally, the category of all-natural beverages is growing very fast, we already seeing the shift and we would like to be in forefront of this revolution.

We have entered the market with our flag ship product called Aquatwist. Aquatwist Herbal Water is a Deliciously Refreshing 100% Natural - ZERO Calorie Drink infused with 100% Natural Herb Extracts, which has No Added Sugar and No Artificial Sweeteners.
name: BEANBAG BEVERAGES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Innovation: The company has come up with innovative idea for the ease in day to day management of society. This innovation will bring revolution in housing societies sector. The idea of innovation is to develop a software that provide all the services that one society and their members required in day to day functioning such as providing details of Plumber, carpenter, mechanic, chemist, restaurants, Grocery shops, theatres with their name and numbers. In situation of emergency it also provides details of nearby Hospitals, Fire brigade, Police station.
OMBLEE is also useful for internal management as it keeps in touch all the members 24/7 via intelligent tools like messenger and intercom. It also makes ease for management by sending notices and bills digitally. One more security feature helps particularly senior citizen by security feature one can access the CCTV through the app and keeps family members safe. Visitors/Guests log is also maintained digitally so real time information is available to all the members.  
Improvement: over the current scenario, we are digitalizing a lot of manual process that society members this days are connecting with their neighbours but in this digital age an app like OMBLEE can improve upon the existing interaction paradigm by enabling digital connectivity across borders. Our digital interaction service will improve upon current manual intercom systems & enable them even in buildings where it is impossible to install traditional intercoms. The omblee security apps will bring a huge improvement over current activity services and will digitalise visitor and parking management.
 As improvement is a continuous process the product will upgrade and improve from time to time for providing continuously better services. Once the product is launched into market the company will evaluate any additions, updation, improvement required in product based on requirement of customers/societies/members and accordingly will make changes in the product.
Scalability: OMBLEE plans to apply a hyperlocal strategy and capture markets area wise. As user grows, OMBLEE cloud servers will auto scale to handle the increase in traffic. Additionally, we plan to tie up with facility management, security management and society management service provides to handle geofenced customer groups w.r.t. customer support and activations.
name: OMBLEE TECHNOLOGY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Our products are differentiated – currently no one is doing anti-microbial or anti stain clothing in the Kids segment. Further we also want to differentiate in the quality of the materials that are generally used for creating a product – currently no one is using 100% organic fabric for children. Our products will also be tailored using data – which no one in the industry is capturing pertaining to kids hobbies, their wishlists etc.
name: POCHEMUCHKA KIDS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are planning to create unique earning capabilities for all members of APMC market, who deals in various kinds of trading, application will not only help traders but also will help farmers to know exact status of sales and incentive earns, if marketed well this solution can be a revolutionary product for entire farmers and resellers and entire loan mechanism of farmers can be tracked, with UID, E KYC etc.
name: REYANK TECHNOLOGY (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: The Company is working towards training and skilling blue collar work force of the company through innovative methods. For this, we have tied up with large industries/ companies that employ a large number of employees to identify procedures in which the employee efficiency can be improved. Through this, we are looking at improving pay for employees through skill up gradation and also enabling them to start their own business through a series of entrepreneurial teachings. We have tied up with a leading garment exported for a pilot project and will look to replicate the same across various geographies and sectors.
name: RIDHI SIDHI SOLAR SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Remad indicates Repairing Mobile Accessories Delivery.We as a brand will provide door to door service to our customers.We will also stand by our commitment of delivering the repaired products within 3 working days. Remad will also provide transparency to maintain strong relationship with its customers and customers will also get the live updates of their products getting repaired. Remad team will not compromise and will be healthy fundamental company with good future investments that the company is going to do moving ahead. Remad will also do its best towards its society and also towards environment. Remad will also deal with second hand products deals which will best fit to consumer's interest ,recharges,new cellphones.Following mentioned services will also be provided with online application and websites. thank you 
regards
team remad
name: REMAD MOBILE SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED

Addition to domestic market , to tap Export Market and focus on Middle East , Africa , Mauritius Malaysia to market the product .
name: TOPLLER LIFEstyle FASHIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: ACNEDR PROVIDES A COMMON PLATFORM FOR OCTORS & PATIENTS TO CONNECT TO EACH OTHER FOR PIMPLE PROBLEM. ACNEDR. POVIDE DERMATOLOGIST CONSULATION SITTING AT HOME. PATIENT JUST NEEDS TO CLICK HIS FACE PICTURE INSTEAD OF VISITNG DOCTOR PHYSICALLY. THIS IS NEW METHOD WHERE THERE IS CHATTING BETWEEN DOCTOR & PATIENTS. ITS A SPECIFIC FOR TREATMENT OF PIMPLES, DARK SPOTS & SCARS.
name: ACNEDR HEALTHTECH PRIVATE LIMITED
